name: Gyakuten Live!
description:
Gyakuten Live!

An "Ace Attorney"-styled fangame based on the Love Live! franchise. Travel through the adventures of your favourite school idols as you solve mysteries and prove the innocence of your clients. Currently has: 1 case, with more on their way!

If you would like to volunteer, I currently need voice actresses. The next voiced character is Kurosawa Dia. Please email krakelak@gmail.com or contact krakelak#5318 on Discord for more information.

Note: The extra chapters are NOT up to date and may crash. You can find them in their entirety on my Youtube channel, accessible through the Youtube video on this page. I will add a disclaimer in a future version.
